items.name: Community Event Planners
items.description: An organization dedicated to enriching the local community through engaging and fun activities. Known for organizing 'Event 1', which offers a morning full of fun activities and interactive sessions.

items.name: Alumni Relations Office
items.description: Facilitates connections among alumni and organizes reunions to foster long-lasting relationships. They are organizing the 'Lafayette College Alumni Reunion Weekend' to welcome alumni back to campus.

items.name: Arts and Music Society
items.description: Showcases artistic talents through events and exhibitions. They are presenting the 'Music and Arts Showcase' to display a wide range of student talents in music and arts.

items.name: Student Government Association
items.description: Empowers students through representation and leadership. They conduct the 'Student Government Elections' to elect new leaders and representatives.

items.name: Environmental Council
items.description: Promotes sustainability and environmental awareness. They are hosting the 'Sustainability Summit' to discuss and explore sustainable practices.

items.name: Festival Organizers
items.description: Creates vibrant festivals to celebrate arts and creativity. The 'Lafayette College Arts Festival' is a major event bringing together artists and the community.

items.name: Sports and Recreation Department
items.description: Organizes sports events and activities. They are planning the 'Sports Gala', a day to enjoy athletic competitions and celebrate team spirit.

items.name: Diversity Initiatives Office
items.description: Focuses on enhancing diversity and inclusion through workshops and discussions. The 'Diversity and Inclusion Workshop' aims to foster an inclusive campus culture.

items.name: Leadership Lecture Series
items.description: Hosts inspirational talks and leadership seminars. The 'Speaker Series: Leaders from Lafayette College' offers insights from distinguished alumni and leaders.
